T02TD1434E:227a-0: @227a * // 'khor lo sdom pa'i lus dkyil gyi mngon rtogs bzhugs /
T02TD1434E:227a-2: # // bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1434E:227a-3: dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa yi //
T02TD1434E:227a-5: sems can rang bzhin yongs shes shing //
T02TD1434E:227a-6: rdzogs pa'i las las 'jug rnams la'o //
T02TD1434E:227a-7: dang po tshogs pa kun ldan pas //
T02TD1434E:227a-8: bla med don 'byung dga' bas nyal //
T02TD1434E:227a-9: bzhi yis nyer bskul zhal bzhi pa//
T02TD1434E:227a-10: bdud 'dul dpa' bo chen po bzhengs //
T02TD1434E:227a-11: khrus byas bde ba'i stan la gnas //
T02TD1434E:227a-12: ri lu khar bcug snying gar h'um //
T02TD1434E:227a-13: sngon po'i 'od kyis rang lus spyang //
T02TD1434E:227a-14: ba spu la spros kha dog lngas //
T02TD1434E:227a-15: 'gro kun lus sbyangs sgo gsum dag / sprin 'dra'i 'od kyis rang mdun du //
T02TD1434E:227a-16: mkha' la bla ma'i 'khor lo dang //
T02TD1434E:227a-17: phyogs dbang mig gi lha rnams ni //
T02TD1434E:227a-18: gsal gdab rten dang brten par byas //
T02TD1434E:227a-19: phyag dang mchod sogs byas nas ni //
T02TD1434E:227a-20: mdzod spu'i gnas nas rang lus gzhug / lus la rten dang brten pa yi //
T02TD1434E:227a-21: 'khor lo gsal gdab nye bar dmigs //
T02TD1434E:227a-22: rtog dang spros pa dga' 'gyur na //
T02TD1434E:227a-24: mdog gsal h'um las lte ba ru //
T02TD1434E:227a-25: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid bsam //
T02TD1434E:227a-26: phyogs 'dab rigs kyi sa bon las //
T02TD1434E:227a-27: snying po'i rnal 'byor ma bzhi bskyed //
T02TD1434E:227a-28: steng 'og lus kyi cha shas la //
T02TD1434E:227a-29: pu dz'a la sogs nyi shu bzhis //
T02TD1434E:227a-30: 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid dran//
T02TD1434E:227a-32: ring po'i h'um las khro mo brgyad //
T02TD1434E:227a-33: de ltar lha rnams thams cad ni //
T02TD1434E:227a-34: me long nang gi gzugs brnyan bzhin //
T02TD1434E:227a-35: phyi yi dkyil 'khor lta bur dmigs //
T02TD1434E:227a-36: mi gsal rtsa yig thams cad la //
T02TD1434E:227a-37: dag pa'i lha nyid mos shing dran //
T02TD1434E:227a-38: phyag rgya sngags kyi don ldan pas //
T02TD1434E:227a-39: ye shes spyan drangs legs mchod nas //
T02TD1434E:227a-40: yi ge bzhi yis rang gnas 'jug / gnas gsum byin brlabs go cha bcings //
T02TD1434E:227a-41: sangs rgyas dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma //
T02TD1434E:227a-42: thams cad nam mkhar nyer dmigs te //
T02TD1434E:227a-43: dbang bskur yid kyis gsol ba gdab //
T02TD1434E:227b-0: bdud @227b rtsis dbang bskur thams cad la //
T02TD1434E:227b-2: gtso bo ma bzhi khro mo dang //
T02TD1434E:227b-3: sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo la //
T02TD1434E:227b-4: mi bskyod rin chen don yod dang //
T02TD1434E:227b-5: rtag pa gar dbang thugs rdo rjes //
T02TD1434E:227b-6: rim pa bzhin du spyi bor mtshan //
T02TD1434E:227b-7: bsdus lam bsdus pa'i dbu rgyan nyid //
T02TD1434E:227b-8: de nas sngags rnams rim gyis mchod //
T02TD1434E:227b-9: bdud rtsis nye bar tshim byas nas //
T02TD1434E:227b-10: dgyes pa sngags kyi sgra byung bsam //
T02TD1434E:227b-11: bdud rtsi myangs la bstod chen bya //
T02TD1434E:227b-12: lha rnams rang gnas thim byas te //
T02TD1434E:227b-13: bsam gtan chen po las kyi lam //
T02TD1434E:227b-14: rdzogs pa'i rim pa legs gnas bya //
T02TD1434E:227b-15: de nas gtor ma'i las rim dang //
T02TD1434E:227b-16: smon lam btab ste ldang bar bya //
T02TD1434E:227b-17: slob dpon chen po rdo rje dril bu pa'i man ngag lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mngon par rtogs pa rdzogs so//
